io.amcp.examples

Class GreetingAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.amcp.examples.GreetingAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, Serializable

    public class GreetingAgent
extends Object
implements Agent
    A simple example agent that demonstrates basic AMCP functionality. This agent responds to greetings and can count events.
    Since:
    AMCP 1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
